Author: red_ossifrage
Text: For real. Not joking when I say my grandmother's REFUSAL to stop taking candid photos, or even to just stop forcing her victims to view these photos, is one of the (myriad) reasons I have an ED.

Author: rdnvl
Text: Candids are probably the most triggering thing for anyone with body image issues. Maybe let them know they aren't the best for your mental health (you don't have to bring up your ED). Also please be careful.
